It is a specific chemical compound that has been identified as a promising versatile core unit for developing high-performance organic field-effect transistors (OFETs) and polymer solar cells.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that the only clear "Property Name" entity is "high-performance". This term is used to describe the potential of the identified chemical compound, "4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene", as a core unit for developing organic field-effect transistors (OFETs) and polymer solar cells.

The other entities in the paragraph, such as "promising" and "versatile", are subjective descriptors that do not clearly refer to material properties. Therefore, they have been excluded from the list of entities.
